title: How to Catch Milotic in Pokémon Ruby, Sapphire or Emerald

steps.title: Go near Fortree city and use Surf in the water.
steps.content: Go near Fortree city and use Surf in the water.

steps.title: Use the Super Rod (or any rod).
steps.content: Use the Super Rod (or any rod).

steps.title: Now try your luck in the tiles, go fish about 10 times in one tile.
steps.content: Now try your luck in the tiles, go fish about 10 times in one tile. Keep doing this with other tiles until you find a Feebas.

steps.title: Feed it Pokéblocks, and max its beauty.
steps.content: Feed it Pokéblocks, and max its beauty.

steps.title: If it doesn't like the Pokéblocks you feed it, then go to the same tile and fish till you get another one.
steps.content: If it doesn't like the Pokéblocks you feed it, then go to the same tile and fish till you get another one.

steps.title: Remember that Feebas only likes Pokéblocks that are in shades of blue.
steps.content: Remember that Feebas only likes Pokéblocks that are in shades of blue. This includes indigo, purple, or other colors related to that.

steps.title: You can make Pokéblocks using these berries:
steps.content: You can make Pokéblocks using these berries: Pomegranate and Corn.

steps.title: Make sure you get more beauty stats from using right berry since any Pokémon can eat 12 Pokéblocks at max.
steps.content: Make sure you get more beauty stats from using right berry since any Pokémon can eat 12 Pokéblocks at max.

steps.title: Start battling until it levels up.
steps.content: Start battling until it levels up. It should evolve into a Milotic.
